insnBImm(uint32).notice: Get the B-type instruction's immediate value

insnFunct3Funct5(uint32).notice: Get the concatenation of instruction's funct3 and funct5 fields

insnFunct3Funct7(uint32).notice: Get the concatenation of instruction's funct3 and funct7 fields

insnIImm(uint32).notice: Get the I-type instruction's immediate value

insnIUimm(uint32).notice: Get the I-type instruction's unsigned immediate value

insnJImm(uint32).notice: Get the J-type instruction's immediate value

insnSImm(uint32).notice: Get the S-type instruction's immediate value

insnUImm(uint32).notice: Get the U-type instruction's immediate value

userdoc.notice: Contract responsible for decoding the riscv's instructions
